title: Activity
description: A marketing activity is the delivery of an experience to one or more audiences.

@id.description: A unique and persistent identifier for the activity.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: The date when the activity becomes valid. Different publishing channels might use the start date in implementation-dependent ways.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date
xdm:endDate.description: The date when the activity expires. Different publishing channels might use the end date in implementation-dependent ways.

xdm:brief.title: Brief
xdm:brief.description: An HTML brief describing the activity.

xdm:channel.title: Channel
xdm:channel.description: Channel on which this activity is executed.

xdm:activityCode.title: Activity Code
xdm:activityCode.description: A short business code to identify the activity within an organisation.

xdm:readOnly.title: Read Only
xdm:readOnly.description: A indicator that the activity is published and therefore cannot be modified anymore.
